title: Pentagon Weighs More Support for Saudi-led War in Yemen – Foreign Policy (blog)
text: Pentagon Weighs More Support for Saudi-led War in Yemen – Foreign Policy (blog) Foreign Policy (blog) Pentagon Weighs More Support for Saudi-led War in Yemen Foreign Policy (blog) The Pentagon is looking to increase support for Saudi Arabia’s two-year-old war against Houthi rebels in Yemen , signaling a possible expansion of Washington’s controversial backing for a campaign that human rights groups say has killed hundreds of …
